name: tanstack-router
description: Build type-safe, file-based React routing with TanStack Router. Supports client-side navigation, route loaders, and TanStack Query integration. Prevents 20 documented errors including validation structure loss, param parsing bugs, and SSR streaming crashes. Use when implementing file-based routing patterns, building SPAs with TypeScript routing, or troubleshooting devtools dependency errors, type safety issues, Vite bundling problems, or Docker deployment issues.
